name: Overview
main: By February 2016, Venezuela had reported over 4,500 confirmed cases of Zika virus. However, unofficial estimates were thought to be as high as 400,000. ACAPS Briefing Note on the Zika outbreak across Latin America and the Caribbean can be found under the Special Reports tab. Most recent ACAPS Briefing Note on the humanitarian situation in Venezuela as of May 2017 can also be found under the Special Reports tab.
